de.devbliss.apitester.dummyserver

Class DummyApiServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.devbliss.apitester.dummyserver.DummyApiServer

  • public class DummyApiServer
extends Object
    Simple HTTP server using Jetty. Tries to find a free port on instanciation and is ready for requests after start(boolean) has been called. All requests are handled by DummyRequestHandler, so read its documentation for information on how requests are handled. Use convenience methods build...RequestUri(...) to create URIs for frequently used requests. Don't forget to call stop() after finishing your tests to free the port again.
    Author:
    hschuetz
